title: What to do people?
selftext:
So, my friend who lives in Glasgow ordered a gift for me from there itself and it has to be shipped to here in India. But the issue is, I got a message from the shipment company that they need to verify my address and for that I have to provide the valid photo id.

The issue here is that all my photo id's have a different address than the one where my friend put the address of, and it is clearly mentioned that I have to provide the address so,that the Customs can validate the address. 

Should I change the address on the Government IDs and that would take atleast 3-4 weeks (Aadhar, Voted Id).

Any suggestions would be helpful? 
Thank You !
